channel.title: Humble Bundle Thread
channel.description:
Well since the old one was purged to the reprocessing facilities, I'll start this new thread.
There is currently a new humble Bundle going on at humblebundle.com
enclose this time: [url='https://www.recoilgames.com'][img]https://www.humblebundle.com/6/icons/rochard.png[/img][/url] [url='https://www.recoilgames.com']Rochard[/url]
[url='https://www.shattergame.com/'][img]https://www.humblebundle.com/6/icons/shatter.png[/img][/url] [url='https://www.shattergame.com/']Shatter[/url]
[url='https://spacepiratesandzombies.com/'][img]https://www.humblebundle.com/6/icons/spaz.png[/img][/url] [url='https://spacepiratesandzombies.com/']Space Pirates and Zombies[/url]
[url='https://www.torchlightgame.com/'][img]https://www.humblebundle.com/6/icons/torchlight.png[/img][/url] [url='https://www.torchlightgame.com/']Torchlight[/url]
[url='https://www.strangeloopgames.com/'][img]https://www.humblebundle.com/6/icons/vessel.png[/img][/url] [url='https://www.strangeloopgames.com/']Vessel[/url]
For tippping more than average get: [url='https://dustforce.com/'][img]https://www.humblebundle.com/6/icons/dustforce.png[/img][/url]
[url='https://dustforce.com/']Dustforce[/url]

item.title: Humble Bundle Thread
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
Already have Torchlight, but this looks like quite a good Bundle! I’ll definitely pick this up some time.

Read full topic

item.title: Humble Bundle Thread
item.dc:creator: Schizophriend
item.description:
I got the BTA because I got paid today and I was in a “what the hell, might as well” mood. So glad I did because Dustforce is amazing. Its somewhat comparable to Super Meat Boy in its platforming aspects, but its very different as well. And the soundtrack, OH GOD THE SOUNDTRACK IS AMAZING! Its worth it just to get the soundtrack.

Read full topic

item.title: Humble Bundle Thread
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Remember when they added Humble Bundle 3 to Humble Bundle 4? I have a Humble Bundle 3 key left over from that that I’d be happy to trade or give away. PM me if you’re interested. I’ll be considering trades first and foremost. (I don’t quite remember what’s in Humble Bundle 3.)

Read full topic

item.title: Humble Bundle Thread
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I’m seriously considering this just for Rochard. The other (currently announced, we know they’ll add more ) games that I want I already have.

Read full topic
